property.name: tez.runtime.cleanup.files.on.interrupt
property.description: Used only for internal testing. Strictly not recommended to be used elsewhere. This parameter could be changed/dropped later.

property.name: tez.runtime.combiner.class
property.description: Specifies a combiner class (primarily for Shuffle)

property.name: tez.runtime.convert.user-payload.to.history-text
property.description: Value: Boolean Whether to publish configuration information to History logger. Default false.

property.name: tez.runtime.enable.final-merge.in.output
property.description: Expert level setting. Enable final merge in ordered (defaultsorter/pipelinedsorter) outputs. Speculative execution needs to be turned off when disabling this parameter. //TODO: TEZ-2132

property.name: tez.runtime.ifile.readahead
property.description: Configuration key to enable/disable IFile readahead.

property.name: tez.runtime.ifile.readahead.bytes
property.description: Configuration key to set the IFile readahead length in bytes.

property.name: tez.runtime.optimize.local.fetch
property.description: If the shuffle input is on the local host bypass the http fetch and access the files directly

property.name: tez.runtime.optimize.shared.fetch
property.description: Share data fetched between tasks running on the same host if applicable

property.name: tez.runtime.partitioner.class
property.description: Specifies a partitioner class, which is used in Tez Runtime components like OnFileSortedOutput

property.name: tez.runtime.pipelined-shuffle.enabled
property.description: Expert level setting. Enable pipelined shuffle in ordered outputs and in unordered partitioned outputs. In ordered cases, it works with PipelinedSorter. set tez.runtime.sort.threads to greater than 1 to enable pipelinedsorter. Ensure to set tez.runtime.enable.final-merge.in.output=false. Speculative execution needs to be turned off when using this parameter. //TODO: TEZ-2132

property.name: tez.runtime.pipelined.sorter.lazy-allocate.memory
tez.runtime.pipelined.sorter.min-block.size.in.mb
property.description: Tries to allocate @link{#TEZ_RUNTIME_IO_SORT_MB} in chunks specified in this parameter.

property.name: tez.runtime.report.partition.stats
property.description: Report partition statistics (e.g better scheduling in ShuffleVertexManager). TEZ-2496 This can be enabled/disabled at vertex level.

property.name: tez.runtime.shuffle.fetch.verify-disk-checksum
property.description: Controls verification of data checksums when fetching data directly to disk. Enabling verification allows the fetcher to detect corrupted data and report the failure against the upstream task before the data reaches the Processor and causes the fetching task to fail.

property.name: tez.runtime.sorter.class
property.description: String value. Which sorter implementation to use. Valid values: - LEGACY - PIPELINED ( default ) {@link org.apache.tez.runtime.library.conf.OrderedPartitionedKVOutputConfig.SorterImpl}

property.name: tez.runtime.unordered.output.buffer.size-mb
property.description: Size of the buffer to use if not writing directly to disk.

property.name: tez.runtime.unordered.output.max-per-buffer.size-bytes
property.description: Maximum size for individual buffers used in the UnsortedPartitionedOutput. This is only meant to be used by unit tests for now.
